name: Gift of the Goddess of Prophecy
title: Gift of the Goddess of Prophecy
desc: "When that time comes, I shall dance, and return the tracks beneath my people's feet back to the stars in the sky..."

skills.desc:
When played: Create 2 Toy Guard and add them to your Hand, then create another 2 Toy Guard and randomly place them into your deck.
After you play Simulanka Summon, add 1 to its number of effects.
Usage(s): 2
